jobsJson.descriptionPlain: We are looking for Support Channel Manager to join our team. If you are passionate about technology and logistics, we would like to meet you! We promise you a fast paced environment with endless challenges that hyper growth creates.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Monitor and track the performance metrics for Singapore contact channels for support - phone, email and driver walk-in hubIntroduce best industry practices and ensure quick deployment of call center processes and systems
  • Develop complete understanding of our business processes and ensure resolution in most efficient manner
  • Preparing monthly reviews and assess the performance of the call center and driver walk-in centre to take corrective actions if required
  • Be involved in multiple cross-functional projects on improving driver and customer satisfaction
  • Analyzing customer data and contribute to organizational strategic plans through meaningful insights, trend analysis, customer behavior reports etc.
  • Facilitate team meetings to ensure effective communications and to ensure that all team members have the necessary information and resources available to provide the highest levels of customer satisfaction and to ensure operational integrity
  • Explore additional support channels and tools to improve support experience

• Overall 5+ years of experience in call center and/or customer service operations and proven record on building customer satisfaction and agent productivity
  • Prior exposure towards team management, conflict resolution
  • Ability to multitask and remain calm under pressure, especially during peak hours or intense situations
  • Can thrive in fast-paced environments and feel comfortable with a very high level of responsibility
  • Exceptional interpersonal, customer service, problem-solving, verbal and written communication skills.Complete understanding of contact center metrics
  • Decisiveness and attention to detailStrong project management capabilities
  • Knowledge in Salesforce and Avaya is an advantage
